content: उत्पातः {@--1@} Flying up, a spring, jump; एकोत्पातेन at one jump. {@--2@} Rebounding, rising up (<ab>fig.</ab> also); करनिहतकंदुकसमाः पातोत्पाता मनुष्याणां <ls>H. 1.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab> {@--3@} A portent, any portentous or unusual phenomenon boding calamity; उत्पातेन ज्ञापिते च <ab>Vārt.</ab>; °जलधरः <ls>K. 111</ls>, <ls n="K.">287</ls>; <ls>Ve. 1. 22</ls>; सापि मुकुमारसुभगेत्युत्पातपरंपरा केयं <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 37.</ls> {@--4@} Any public calamity (as an eclipse, earthquake &c.); °केतु <ls>K. 5</ls>; °धूमलेखा Ketu; <ls>Māl. 9. 48.</ls>
